metadata.title: President Asif Ali Zardari expresses sorrow over loss of lives in earthquake in ChinaÃ¢ÂÂs Xizang region

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 7 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Tuesday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the tragic loss of lives and the damage to the property caused by the earthquake that struck Chinaas Xizang region. aMy sympathies are with the government, the people of China, and the earthquake victims during this hour of grief,a the president said in a press statement. aWe stand in solidarity with our Chinese brothers and sisters, sharing their sorrow in this difficult time,a he added. President Asif Ali Zardari also prayed for the speedy recovery of those injured in the earthquake.

summary.text: President Asif Ali Zardari expressed deep sorrow over the loss of lives and property damage in China's Xizang region due to an earthquake.
